about.title: About me
about.content:
Hi! I'm Pol, a web developer specialised in VueJS and Laravel, although I also have experience with NextJS, Angular, NodeJS, Symfony, and Django. Additionally, I have skills in containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.

Currently, I am working on my biggest solo project to date: a video and streaming platform that aims to provide an enriching experience for both individual users and their communities.

facecard.content: Full Stack Web Developer, specialised in VueJS and Laravel.

header.content: Hello,I'm Pol,web developer
